title: Cmake config does not seem correct when using components without a core library

content.raw:
# Summary

The [ign-tools](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-tools/pull-requests/9) library will have a `launch` component, and there is no main/core library. The problem I've encountered occurs when a downstream library tries to use the `launch` component.

I would expect a downstream CMakeLists.txt file to look like:

```
ign_find_package(ignition-tools REQUIRED COMPONENTS launch)
...
target_link_libraries(mylib PRIVATE  ignition-tools::launch)
```

Instead, I have to write:

```
ign_find_package(ignition-tools-launch REQUIRED) 
...
target_link_libraries(mylib PRIVATE  ignition-tools::ignition-tools-launch)
```

The above alternative works, but seems to different from the normal pattern. 

# Additional context

You can find a working example of the problem [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugins/pull-requests/3)
